patthana21.37:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana21.37:1.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
patthana21.37:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of health, the sake of seeing the cause and the reason.
patthana21.37:4.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana21.37:5.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it for the sake of seeing the cause or reason;
patthana21.37:6.1_0: This is the one kind of meditation that they won’t take one kind of meditation.
